nodes.text: Dented Droid were a commercial chain of droid repair shops which were in business during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Stores in the chain could be found in cities, spaceports and space stations throughout the galaxy, including one store on the Wheel space station. The Wheel store was run by the Sullustan mechanic Jilaa San, who often took on to much work at once and ended up working way past deadlines due to poor timekeeping and organization.

Dented Droid first appeared in 2013 in Beyond the Rim, an adventure module written by Sterling Hershey for the Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game, Star Wars: Edge of the Empire. The Wheel store was included as somewhere that players could potentially interact with whilst searching for information on the Wheel.
